Actions.Name: Spear Slash
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage to foes at range 2.

Actions.Name: Slide
Actions.Description: The Diver dashes 4 with phasing, dealing 2 damage to all characters it passes through.

Actions.Name: Dive
Actions.Description: The Diver chooses a foe in range 4, then removes themselves from the battlefield. At the end of that foe's next turn, that foe must save as the Diver descends, dealing [D] four times on a failed save, or twice on a successful save. Lower this damage by [D] for every adjacent ally of the target, which could cause it to do no damage. Then, place the Diver in any free space in range 2.
